name: astronomy-dz-mobile
description: Astronomy DZ web app with native Android wrapper via Capacitor.

scripts.mobile:init: npm run mobile:prepare && npx cap add android
scripts.mobile:copy: npm run mobile:prepare && npx cap copy android
scripts.mobile:sync: npm run mobile:prepare && npx cap sync android
scripts.mobile:android: npm run mobile:sync && npm run mobile:open
